reason: Cloud and IP networking engineering relevant though complex.
title: DISN Advanced Engineering & Transport Solutions (DAETS)  formally MANDO v2
descriptionSnippet:
{"description":"

DISA is seeking market research from qualified sources to provide full-spectrum engineering support for the Defense Information Systems Network (DISN). This effort covers all elements, layers, and gateways, including Internet Protocol (IP)-based and switched infrastructure secured over terrestrial and undersea fiber-optic networks, as well as military and commercial satellite communications. Support will span legacy, current, and future Department of Defense (DoD) and DISA capabilities. Key focus areas include IP and Optical Networking, Cloud Computing, Access and Peering Gateways. The Government is requesting industry feedback from companies with the expertise and proven experience to deliver secure, reliable, and innovative engineering solutions that advance DISA&rs...

title: H20 Engineering Services
descriptionSnippet:
{"description":"

(DRAFT) - The Naval Surface Warfare Center Dahlgren Division (NSWCDD) has a requirement to provide engineering services to the NSWCDD Maritime Warfare Control Systems Division (H20) for the development of Maritime Command and Control systems, Warfare/Weapons Control systems, and future warfare development. H20 supports programs/systems such as: Littoral Combat Ship (LCS) Mission Package (MP); Surface Launcher System (SLS); Vertical Launching Systems (VLS); AN/SQQ-89, Undersea Warfare (USW)/Anti-Submarine Warfare (ASW) Combat Systems (USWCS/ASWCS); Aegis Weapons and Fire Control; Autonomous and Unmanned Systems; Electromagnetic Maneuver Warfare (EMW); Information Warfare/Big Data; Machine Learning; and Artificial Intelligence (AI).
